name: 8x8 platformer
description:
A simple platformer, created in like, a week, cause I was bored.

Sprites are mostly 8 by 8 pixels, to hide the fact that I absolutely can't draw, and the game was created with the Godot engine.

You can move with the arrows, wall jump, bounce off mushrooms and airjump thanks to the green "crystals"

The game currently has only 3 levels, but I may add more a bit later.
